org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.misc

Class PrinterAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.misc.PrinterAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent<java.lang.Void>, Blade

    public abstract class PrinterAgent
extends BladeBase
implements Agent<java.lang.Void>
    A PrinterAgent can be used to print multiple lines without having any other text being interleaved by other blades using the same Printer.

    Sample Usage:

     //Prints a banner without allowing any intervening lines.
 public class PrinterAgentSample extends PrinterAgent {

     public PrinterAgentSample(Printer _printer) throws Exception {
         psuper(_printer);
     }

     // Returns a request to print a Hi! banner.
     public AsyncRequest<Void> startAReq() {
         return new AsyncRequest<Void>(getReactor()) {
             @Override
             public void processAsyncRequest() throws Exception {
                 printer.printlnSReq("*********").local(messageProcessor);
                 printer.printlnSReq("*       *").local(messageProcessor);
                 printer.printlnSReq("*  Hi!  *").local(messageProcessor);
                 printer.printlnSReq("*       *").local(messageProcessor);
                 printer.printlnSReq("*********").local(messageProcessor);
                 processAsyncResponse(null);
             }
         };
     }
 }

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Printer printer
      The printer used to print the text.
